title: Japan's Largest Price Comparison Site Kakaku.com Launches Indian Version of Priceprice.com
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/1/2015 @ 9:00 PM   Kakaku.com, Inc. 
TOKYO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Kakaku.com, Inc. (TOKYO:2371) has launched the Indian version of Priceprice.com , a price comparison site for mobile phones, tablets, computers and household appliances. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150901005010/en/ 
When shopping online, it is time consuming to compare various shopping sites to see whether you are getting the best deal or not. Priceprice.com shows a list of products from various sites, sorting the results from lowest to highest price, to easily show you the best available price for that product. 
Kakaku.com is the largest price comparison site in Japan with approximately 50 million monthly users. 18 years since its founding, Kakaku.com has strengthened its management expertise and in recent years, the company has expanded its service globally. Following the launch in the Philippines , Thailand and Indonesia , Priceprice.com has established its position as the largest price comparison site in Southeast Asia with approximately 5.3 million unique users in all 3 countries combined as of June 2015. We have now launched a new site in one of the fast-growing e-commerce market, India, where we dedicate ourselves continuously to offer pleasurable shopping experience for consumers. 
Priceprice.com Features Find the best online shopping deals You can search approximately 6,000 products including mobile phones, tablets, computers, household appliances and cameras and compare prices from various online retailers. With one glance, you can easily find which site has the lowest price for the product you seek. You can click through to the site to buy the product directly. Easy search to match your needs You can easily search for products you want with our search function which uses criteria such as its price range, manufacturers, brand names, function, color and keywords. You can also rearrange the sort order by number of times accessed, lowest price, user reviews and ratings. Detailed specifications of the products are also available. See what other users think about the product The forums for each product allow a place for people to ask questions about a product or for users to exchange opinions with other users. You can also see the ratings and reviews written by users who have actually used the products. 
As we continue to improve product search and comparison functions, we also hope to include price information from offline retailers to further expand our services. 
* Priceprice.com can be used on computers as well as smart phones.
